page.title: 17Tourism (cont)
page.content: There are a few small sites for touring caravans, where farms may take a maximum of 6 on their fields at any time, but Bellman Ground has an unusual layout. The static caravans are all painted shades of green, are placed in clearings between the trees, and merge in to the landscape as advised by the planning authority. Hot air ballooning is a recent development in the last two decades, and has become a lakeland sport. It so happens that these are launched at a distance of approximately 10 miles from the SW, the valley is in the flight path, so the local rallies and races of these give great enjoyment to those on the ground. Fell walking has now become very popular on all paths and bridleways.
